mapper.insert: insert into center(mem_id, center_Type, center_Title, center_Detail) values(#{mem_id}, #{center_Type}, #{center_Title}, #{center_Detail})
mapper.update: update center set center_Type=#{center_Type}, center_Title=#{center_Title}, center_Detail=#{center_Detail} where center_No=#{center_No}
mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY center_creDate DESC) as recNum, table1.* from ( SELECT center_No , mem_id , center_Type , center_Title , center_Detail , center_creDate , center_update , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CENTER_TYPE ORDER BY center_creDate ASC) AS type_No FROM CENTER order by center_creDate desc ) as table1 ) as table2 where recNum between (#{section}-1)*100+ (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 and (#{section}-1)*100+(#{pageNum})*10

select q_Num , mem_id , q_Status , q_Title , q_content , q_creDate , a_reply , a_creDate , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY mem_id ORDER BY q_creDate ASC) AS q_mem_No from question where mem_id=#{mem_id} order by q_creDate DESC
mapper.insert: insert into question(mem_id, q_Title, q_content) values(#{mem_id}, #{q_Title}, #{q_content})
